questions.question: 1. Which IS code is used for seismic design of the structure?

explanations.a: IS 1893 (Part 1) is used for seismic design of the structure

questions.question: 2. The density of plain concrete in (kN/m<sup>3</sup>) is _________

explanations.c: The density of plain concrete is 24 kN/m<sup>3</sup>

questions.question: 3. Following load combinations are not recommended by IS 456 (2000).

explanations.b: (DL + IL + EL) 1.5 is not recommended by IS 456 (2000)

questions.question: 4. The unit weight of reinforced cement concrete as per IS 456-2000.

explanations.a: The unit weight of reinforced cement concrete as per IS 456-2000 is 2500 kg/m<sup>3</sup>

questions.question: 5. Which IS code is used for imposed load calculations structure?

explanations.a: IS 875 Part II (1987) is used for imposed load calculations structure
